# Appendix

## Setup {#sec-setup}

A common Integrated Development Environment for R is Rstudio by Posit.co. RStudio can be downloaded for free, and provides you with an interface in which a command line terminal, a text editor, a plotting window and file manager are combined. Many other features are also included.
